name: Integrated Trade Processing
overview:
Integrated Trade Processing is a provider of trading technology services, designed to enable financial institutions to automate and control, in real time, the flow of trade information within their firms and between counterparties.

ITPâ€™s solutions enable greater product innovation, increased operational efficiency, and lower overall costs; all delivered with the highest quality of service. Our client relationships include Investment Managers, Brokers, Custodians, Plan Sponsors, and Operations Outsourcers. Many of these top-tier firms are utilizing ITP solutions to automate and streamline their global, multi-asset class trading.

Founded in 1999 and based in New York City, the ITP team includes veterans from some of the industryâ€™s most innovative and fastest growing firms.

funding_rounds.source_description: Integrated Trade Processing Secures $9 Million in Investment Round Led by Grail Partners
